name: Familiar Ground
condition: Moves matching your most-played style this round

name: Second Nature
condition: Moves you've already played this game

name: Style Points
condition: Moves with a style you haven't played this round

name: Tough Crowd
effect: Crowd favor requires cost 4+ to win

name: Standing Ovation
effect: Ties all win crowd favor (but no +1 discount)

name: Underdog Moment
effect: Lowest cost among successful moves wins crowd favor

name: Fresh Start
effect: Chain discount applies even if previous cost was higher

name: Combo Breaker
effect: No chain discounts this beat (for anyone)
